titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the gross income exclusion with respect to personal injury liability assignments shall apply where the plaintiff becomes a secured creditor of the assignee.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/17/1988--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income any amount of assignments of personal injury liability payments whose recipient becomes a secured creditor of the assignee.
